Summary: It Lite up the sky so bright then took off to the woods
divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my Brother David were in the truck driving to the Deer Woods.When the Sky just got so Bright it was like complete Daylight but at 4:30 in the morning so bright you could count the Rocks on the gravel road.It lite up the sky unbelievabley i looked and him and we both looked out it was a huge Circle going over head maybe 100 Ft from the ground.I asked him wth was that omg David what is that we both kinda just went WOOOAHH. Well it didnt get weird till we got to Were my other Brother and a guy Named Orybry where at and the first thing i said was omg did you guys see that UFO.Both of them said did you guys see that also they also added that it flew straight over the top of them and Landed in the woods this is 4 people who seen the exact same thing and were in different cars and more then 10-11 Miles away from each other. One of the most amazing things ive seen in my life im sstill Scared when i go to those woods alone still gives me chills even talking about it.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Walnut Ridge
This sighting has never been favorited.
